summary: The client agreed to proceed with sprint plan SP-001, which was successfully created and saved including STYLE-001, US-008, and US-006 to establish UI foundation, backend, and secure login for a demoable auth flow. The team is ready to start execution.

decisions.title: Proceed with Sprint Plan SP-001
decisions.details: Plan includes STYLE-001, US-008, and US-006 focusing on UI, backend, and secure login

sign_offs.what: Agreed to proceed with sprint plan SP-001

actions.task: Start execution of sprint plan SP-001

backlog_deltas.title: Sprint plan created with STYLE-001, US-008, and US-006
